summary: A super-stylized, surreal biography of Armenian troubadour Sayat Nova, whose life is depicted through non-narrative amalgamations of poetic images.
cast: Sofiko Chiaureli|Melkon Alekyan|Vilen Galstyan|Gogi Gegechkori|Spartak Bagashvili|Medea Japaridze|Hovhannes Minasyan|Onik Minasyan|Yuri Amiryan|I. Babayan|Medea Bibileishvili|T. Dvali|Aleksandr Dzhanshiyev|Guranda Gabunia|Zh. Gharibyan|L. Karamyan|G. Margaryan|G. Matsukatov|Yuri Merdenov|Bela Mirianashvili|E. Panakhchyan|B. Tatishvili
title: Sayat nova. El color de la granada
